title:
On the global complexity of a derivative-free Levenberg-Marquardt
  algorithm via orthogonal spherical smoothing
abstract:
In this paper, we propose a derivative-free Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm for
nonlinear least squares problems, where the Jacobian matrices are approximated
via orthogonal spherical smoothing. It is shown that the gradient models which
use the approximate Jacobian matrices are probabilistically first-order
accurate, and the high probability complexity bound of the algorithm is also
given.
